item.title: Fixed it
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

[quote=“Sonis, post:4, topic:101018”]Look At case 73:
Knowing that You Are A decent coder; I’m going to make You A check list ^^

As I say “You” that can Apply As the client It self And Not Yourself -.-

Make sure that You know who your attacking
Make sure that You Add the If’s for if inWildness == true ect.
If Your Currently Attacking Or not.

Now looking In the Process()
search for the “IsAttacking == true” Make Sure Not “IsAttackingNPC”
make sure That person you’r attacking isn’t null (Like loged out)
Make sure that you set reset Attack if or loged out.

Now look for the boolean Attack
Make sure that You know his abs.X And abs.Y
Also Current HP And The Max[ for max, get his xp then Use getLevelForXP]
Place All the delay times… And XP From Combat
Also Know what type Of weapon You Are using.

More IF’s In Wildness == true stuff
Distance Factores… This Is where knowing what weapon Is being used is useful
Have the Animation Of Attacking…
Random int set by Your strength to know how much to decrease oponets’ HP.

Thats pretty much it. I might of skiped something Though. I’ll check my client out in a sec.[/quote]yer actually ur right it was in case:73

a couple things in there i misspelt and put things in the wrong spots lol i fixed it lol

Read full topic
